thread.section_title: SuretyBonds.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of SuretyBonds.com | suretybonds.com | 3 of 23
thread.title: Keriann

author: Keriann
title: Keriann
text:
I always have to email the rep to ask for a copy of my bond and he acts like it's so much work to get it to me.
Also, just recently I asked if we got a bulk discount if we purchased bonds 4 or 5 more states (while asking for Quote: s for these bonds) and he responded with some obnoxious response that no they don't offer bulk discounts, don't I know how business works.
Well I know enough about it to know they will probably lose my business. I don't know if I got a bad rep or what, but there are plenty of businesses out there willing to offer bonds and I don't need to deal with idiots like that.
